trends: There has been one other sighting in Everton
There were no other sightings in Everton on or around January 7th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 6:45 am and I was walking up to the upper barn to feed the goats and I looked to the west because the sun was rising in the east and I saw this long pulsating white cylinder like bright light pulsating above the trees and as some regular air traffic in the air but just passenger jets and looked at it for about 9 or so minutes keeping track of the time off my cell phone and just faded away.
